title: Hadith Collection (Placeholder)
summary: Structure for saving narrations, chain commentary, and trust indicators until the full database populates.
content:
This section is currently serving as a template. Each narraton entry will contain the Arabic and English matn, its sanad, narrator reliability notes, and links to primary hadith databases.

The goal is to store curated extracts from Sahihayn and other canonical compilations, with annotations that explain the grade, the recommended legal schools, and how it relates to Qurʾānic guidance.
